``` 
intros m x y x' y' m1 m2 Hinv Hexpf1 Hexpf2 Hexpf3 Hexpf4.
destruct (expf_dec m x_1 y) as [Hexpf | Hnotexpf].
- apply eq_symmetry in Hexpf.
  apply expf_not_orbit_x in Hexpf1.
  + contradiction.
  + apply Hinv.
- apply expf_L0_CS in Hexpf2.
  + destruct Hexpf2 as [[H1 H2] | [H3 H4]].
    * contradiction.
    * destruct H4 as [H41 [H42 | H43]].
      -- apply expf_not_orbit_x_aux in H41.
        ++ contradiction.
        ++ apply Hinv.
      -- apply expf_not_orbit_x in H42.
        contradiction.
  + apply Hinv.
Qed. 
```

original: intros m x y x' y' m1 m2 Hinv Hexpf1 Hexpf2 Hexpf3 Hexpf4. destruct (expf_dec m x_1 y) as [Hexpf | Hnotexpf]. - apply eq_symmetry in Hexpf. apply expf_not_orbit_x in Hexpf1. + contradiction. + apply Hinv. - apply expf_L0_CS in Hexpf2. + destruct Hexpf2 as [[H1 H2] | [H3 H4]]. * contradiction. * destruct H4 as [H41 [H42 | H43]]. -- apply expf_not_orbit_x_aux in H41. ++ contradiction. ++ apply Hinv. -- apply expf_not_orbit_x in H42. contradiction. + apply Hinv.
